resources.string: This application needs active internet connection to work properly. Please connect to internet and try again.

string-array.name: nav_drawer_items
string-array.item: Help - How do I use this App

string-array.name: instructions
string-array.item: Dashboard allows you to view and add Active alerts, Favorites and old Alerts
Active Alerts Tab shows you all the alerts set by you and still not hit. You can add new laerts by clicking \'+\' Floating Menu on bottom right corner.
Old Alerts Tab shows you the alerts which are already hit in past.
You can request for a Comparison video on demand for comparing upto three stocks based on their fundamentals.
You can watch Fundamental Analysis Video for top NSE stocks.
You can request for a Fundamental Analysis Video for a stock of your choice from top traded NSE stocks.
You can build your favorites stock list by clicking \'+\' Floating menu on bottom right. Menu gives you options to select NSE stocks , World Indices and so on.
Once you select a stock/indice on next screen , it takes you to the Alert and Favorite Set up screen. You can click on \'+ Favorite\' button on bottom to add.
To set alert, set the alert price by either using 1% increment buttons or sliding the bar on right side. you can also enter the value yourself in the field.
Once you have your favorite list build you can directly click on a stock there to set new alerts for it. No need to search that script again.
There is a \'Refresh\' floating button on bottom left side which allows you to get last traded price for your stocks.
You should setup your broker details so that when your Stock alert hits you can directly call him from this app.
Profile is mandatory. Its important to fill correct values so that app can send the notifications on your mobile
